TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IntranetZoneCredentialPolicy extends System.Object implements class System.Net.ICredentialPolicy

summary.span: 定义凭据策略，该凭据策略将用于使用 及其派生类发出的资源请求。

span.span: Defines a credential policy to be used for resource requests that are made using and its derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此策略允许凭据才会发送请求的资源是否处于正在发出请求的客户端所在的域。This policy allows credentials to be sent only if the requested resource is in the same domain as the client that is making the request. 对于许多应用程序这是最佳的策略，因为它会阻止正在随请求一起发送的资源不在 intranet 上的网络凭据。For many applications this is the optimal policy because it prevents network credentials from being sent with requests for resources that are not on the intranet. > [!NOTE] > 仅当调用策略或关联的请求已不是凭据`null`。 policies are invoked only if the or the that is associated with the request has credentials that are not `null`. 设置此策略具有未指定凭据的请求没有影响。Setting this policy has no effect on requests that do not specify credentials. 使用属性来设置策略。Use the property to set the policy. 处理身份验证请求将调用方法，然后再执行身份验证。The that handles authentication for the request will invoke the method before performing the authentication. 如果请求的资源处于不同的域客户端，方法将返回`false`，并不执行身份验证。If the requested resource is in a different domain than the client, the method returns `false`, and authentication is not performed. 此策略影响的所有实例使用当前的应用程序域中的非 null 凭据。This policy affects all instances of with non-null credentials in the current application domain. 策略不能在单个请求中重写。The policy cannot be overridden on individual requests. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实例并使用它来设置凭据策略为应用程序域。The following code example demonstrates creating an instance of and using it to set the credential policy for the application domain. [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool ShouldSendCredential (Uri challengeUri, System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.NetworkCredential credential, System.Net.IAuthenticationModule authModule);

Public Overridable Function ShouldSendCredential (challengeUri As Uri, request As WebRequest, credential As NetworkCredential, authModule As IAuthenticationModule) As Boolean

returns.span: 如果所请求的资源与发出请求的客户端在同一个域中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the requested resource is in the same domain as the client making the request; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序不调用此方法直接调用它由调用，它负责执行与服务器的身份验证。Applications do not call this method directly; it is called by the that is responsible for performing authentication with the server. 如果此方法返回`false`，则将向服务器对客户端进行身份验证。If this method returns `false`, the will not authenticate the client to the server. 调用此方法仅对请求指定的凭据或使用对象，指定凭据。This method is called only for requests that specify credentials or use a object that specifies credentials. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了派生自以允许凭据的使用基本身份验证使用安全超文本传输协议 (HTTPS) 的请求发送。The following code example demonstrates deriving from to allow credentials to be sent for requests that use Secure Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTPS) with basic authentication. 使用 HTTPS 和基本身份验证，在通过网络发送之前进行加密的用户密码。Using HTTPS and basic authentication, the user password is encrypted before being sent over the network. [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#4)]
